tool_description: Checks seasonal availability and accessibility of ingredients based on location and time of year, providing alternatives when items are out of season or unavailable.

ingredients.description: List of ingredients to check availability for

season.description: Season to check availability for: spring, summer, fall, winter

error_messages: Invalid ingredient format: Provide ingredient names as strings without quantities or measurements.
Unrecognized location: Use standard geographic format like 'New York, NY, USA' or 'London, UK'.
Invalid season: Use one of [spring, summer, fall, winter, current].
Empty ingredient list: Provide at least one ingredient to check.
usage: Provide a list of ingredients and your location. Optionally specify a season to check future availability. The tool returns availability status and suggests alternatives for unavailable items.

available_ingredients.description: List of ingredients that are currently available

unavailable_ingredients.description: List of ingredients that are not available

availability_notes.description: Additional notes about seasonal patterns and sourcing tips
